contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=August 2009}} {{Infobox Person | name = Walter Staunton Mack Jr. | birth_date = {{Birth-date|1895}} | death_date = {{death-date|1990}} | occupation = [[Businessman]], [[Financier]] }} '''Walter Staunton Mack Jr''' (1895 â€“ March 18, 1990) was a [[United States of America|U.S.]] drink [[businessman]] and [[financier]]. He was president of [[Pepsi-Cola]] [[Company (law)|Company]] from 1938 until 1951 after taking over from [[Charles Guth]] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Mack, Walter Staunton, Jr. | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1895 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = March 18, 1990 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mack, Walter Staunton, Jr.}} [[Category:1895 births]] [[Category:1990 deaths]] [[Category:American businesspeople]] [[Category:PepsiCo people]] {{US-business-bio-stub}}
